caption.p: Optimized configurations of a Co@NC and b CoFe@NC with chemisorption of *OH, O*, *OOH and *O 2 intermediates (atoms with yellow, blue, red, white and pink colors represent Fe, Co, O, H and N atoms, respectively). The calculated free energy diagrams for the OER on Co@NC and CoFe@NC at applied potentials of c 0 V, d 1.23 V (equilibrium potential) and 1.75 V. e Charge density difference of CoFe (110) layer and NC (111) layer (the yellow and blue isosurfaces show the electron gaining and losing, respectively)
